ğŸŒŸ Personal Characteristics:

Throughout my life, curiosity has been my main drive, pushing me to continuously explore and learn.

In the world of technology, I believe anything is possible, as long as the risks are aligned with the stakeholders. This optimistic mindset drives my daily work.

I see architecture not as good or bad, but as efficient when it meets business requirements. Efficiency is the key measure.

\

Choosing a technology goes beyond current trends. A careful analysis of multiple factors is essential for making informed decisions about languages and frameworks.
